channel.title: Pwnagescapez Release V1
channel.description:
This is my first release of a source and all of the staff have been working to improve and upgrade the server.
We are updating and in progress on improving daily almost all day every single day.
Here are some pics of our progress so far:
Home:
[img]http://www.upload.ee/image/4111899/Home_area.png[/img]
[img]http://www.upload.ee/image/4111900/Shop_1_Home.png[/img]
OPZone: For farming rune (g) armor which is stronger than usual.
[img]http://www.upload.ee/image/4111902/OPZone.png[/img]
Nex Armor: Area for farming Nex gear (Torva/Pernix/Virtus) **Donator Only Gear**
[img]http://www.upload.ee/image/4111906/Nex_Armor.png[/img]
Rarezone: For farming rares and coins/ckeys.
[img]http://www.upload.ee/image/4111909/rarezone.png[/img]
Donator Zone: Zone for donators (Will be upgraded)
[img]http://www.upload.ee/image/4111912/Donator_Zone.png[/img]
Extreme Donator Zone: For extreme donators (Also being worked on)
[img]http://www.upload.ee/image/4111913/Extreme_Donar_Zone.png[/img]
[img]http://www.upload.ee/image/4111915/Extreme_Donar_Shop.png[/img]
WORKING DICE!!
[img]http://www.upload.ee/image/4111918/Dice.png[/img]
Now I would like to give credits to this source release. It was based from InsidiaX's source, so a lot of credit goes to them. I would also like to give credit to Kapt for mostly coding the server and helping with everything updated so far and to come.
Download the Source : [URL=http://"https://www.dropbox.com/s/64cvkmknj3ugqjz/Pwnagescapez%20Release%20V1.rar"]Here[/URL]
If you would like to check out the server we're working on with this source, please visit: [URL=http://"http://www.pwnagescapez.webs.com"]Our Website[/URL]
Thanks. - Deboom

item.title: Pwnagescapez Release V1
item.dc:creator: @tdmister45 tdmister45
item.description:
@tdmister45 wrote:

This is my first release of a source and all of the staff have been working to improve and upgrade the server.

We are updating and in progress on improving daily almost all day every single day.

Here are some pics of our progress so far:

Home:

OPZone: For farming rune (g) armor which is stronger than usual.

Nex Armor: Area for farming Nex gear (Torva/Pernix/Virtus) Donator Only Gear

Rarezone: For farming rares and coins/ckeys.

Donator Zone: Zone for donators (Will be upgraded)

Extreme Donator Zone: For extreme donators (Also being worked on)

WORKING DICE!!

Now I would like to give credits to this source release. It was based from InsidiaX’s source, so a lot of credit goes to them.
I would also like to give credit to Kapt for mostly coding the server and helping with everything updated so far and to come.

Download the Source : [URL=http://“https://www.dropbox.com/s/64cvkmknj3ugqjz/Pwnagescapez%20Release%20V1.rar”]Here[/URL]

If you would like to check out the server we’re working on with this source, please visit: [URL=http://“http://www.pwnagescapez.webs.com”]Our Website[/URL]

Thanks. - Deboom
